name: Arcade Absurdity
description:
You play as a small alien, who decided to hide in an arcade all day, waiting for night to fall. Then, they'll get to play all the games without having to wait for their turn. Go on and explore all the fun games and interactable things in this one arcade room! Try to reach nice high scores :)

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys : Move around
  • SPACE : Interact / Shoot
  • M : Mute music
  • Backspace  : Exit minigame (main game exit is alt+f4)

Credits:

  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/8-bit-fortress.font
